excerpt: "AI' based MomGPT, in a social media campaign. Just like everyone goes to their mothers with endless questions, MomGPT offered advice and answers to the questions from the audiences. MoMGPT was Live on the brand's Social media platforms Linkedin and Instagram from 12th May 2023 till Mother's Day on 14th May 2023."
